lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 1 (Breakfast)
lean_diet_plan.descp: Oats with 1 scoop of Whey Protein or Skimmed milk powder and water. Add some almonds or peanuts, honey . Also have a fruit (Apple, Banana or Orange)

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 2 (2 -3 hours gap)
lean_diet_plan.descp: Oats with 1 scoop of Whey Protein or Skimmed milk powder and water. Add some almonds or peanuts, honey . Also have a fruit (Apple, Banana or Orange)

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 3 (2 -3 hours gap)
lean_diet_plan.descp: 2 egg whites/100gms paneer and a fruit (Orange, WaterMelon etc)

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 4 (Lunch) (2 -3 hours gap)
lean_diet_plan.descp: Rotis or Brown rice with lentils, peas or beans(daal, rajma etc.)

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 5 (Pre Workout) (2 -3 hours gap)
lean_diet_plan.descp: Take 1 cup Oats, 1 scoop whey protein or skimmed milk powder ad blend it. Then add 1 spoon of peanut butter, 1 whole banana, chocolate syrup(If using skimmed milk powder), few ice cubes and water. Blend the whole mixture and have it 2 hours prior to workout. 10 minutes prior to

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 6 (Post Workout)
lean_diet_plan.descp: Protein shake(1 scoop with water) or 4 to 5 egg whiter or skimmed milk powder(1 or 2 scoops)

lean_diet_plan.title: Meal 7 (Dinner) (2 -3 hours gap )
lean_diet_plan.descp: Vegetable salad with 100 to 200 gms chicken breast/paneer.

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 1 (Breakfast)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: Oats with 1 scoop of Whey Protein or Skimmed milk powder and water. Add some almonds or peanuts, honey . Also have a fruit (Apple, Banana or Orange)

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 2 (2 -3 hours gap)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: A Banana with 1 spoon of peanut butter on a slice of whole wheat bread.

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 3 (Lunch) (2 -3 hours gap)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: 3 roti or Brown rice with scrambled eggs (3 whites 1 whole eggs) or lentils, peas or beans(daal, rajrna etc.)

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 4 (Pre Workout) (2 -3 hours gap)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: Take 1 cup Oats, 1 scoop whey protein or skimmed milk powder ad blend it. Then add 1 spoon of peanut butter, 1 whole banana, chocolate syrup(If using skimmed milk powder), few ice cubes and water. Blend the whole mixture and have it 2 hours prior to workout. 10 minutes prior to

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 3 (Lunch)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: 3 rot' or Brown rice with scrambled eggs (3 whites 1 whole eggs) or lentils, peas or beans(daal, rajma etc.)

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 4 (Pre Workout)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: Take 1 cup Oats, 1 scoop whey protein or skimmed milk powder ad blend it. Then add 1 spoon of peanut butter, 1 whole banana, chocolate syrup(If using skimmed milk powder), few ice cubes and water. Blend the whole mixture and have it 2 hours prior to workout. 10 minutes prior to workout have black coffee.

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 5 (Post Workout)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: Protein shake(1 scoop with water) or 4 to 5 egg whiter or skimmed milk powder(1 or 2 scoops)

bulk_diet_plan.title: Meal 1 (Dinner)
bulk_diet_plan.descp: 2 rot's or brown rice with 200 gms chicken breast or peas/ beans(ratma, chowli etc)

standard.title: Breakfast
standard.descp:
2 boiled egg whites
Corn flakes with skimmed milk

standard.title: Lunch
standard.descp:
Red rice with steam cooked tuna
Vegetable salad(Carrot, cucumber, cabbage, lettuce)

standard.title: Snack
standard.descp:
1 cup of green tea
4 oatmeal cookies
5 almonds

standard.title: Dinner
standard.descp:
Steam cooked chicken breasts
Fruit salad

standard.title: Lunch
standard.descp:

standard.title: Snack
